DOC.brief_summary: This Phase I/IIa randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled study evaluate safety , reactogenicity , immunogenicity 3 potency ( dosage ) H5N1 VLP vaccine placebo healthy adult 18 40 year age .

Available telephone . 4 . Free obvious health problem establish medical history clinical examination enter study . 5 . If subject childbearing potential , must abstinent use adequate contraceptive precaution ( e.g. , intrauterine contraceptive device ; oral contraceptive equivalent hormonal contraception ) 30 day prior vaccination . She must also negative pregnancy test study entry must agree continue precaution two month completion vaccination . 6 . Must provide write , informed consent . 1 . Use investigational nonregistered product ( drug vaccine ) study vaccine ( ) within 30 day precede administration study vaccine , plan use study period . 2 . Has receive license vaccine within 4 week prior enrollment study . 3 . Has receive influenza vaccine within prior 12 month period . 4 . Has receive investigational vaccine design protection avian influenza . 5 . Administration immunoglobulins and/or blood product within three month precede administration study vaccine study . 8 . Acute disease time enrollment .
